name: Cross Gunfire - Sniper War
description:
GUNFIRE OF WORLD WAR II NEVER FADES AWAY!
During World War II,our troop was stopped by a group of enemies in a city,they have powerful guns and tried to trap us in a lane,the battle broke out and there's no way to get out of this. All we can do is to fight like a real soldier and take down those enemies. Let the gunfire roar in the morning of World War II. Risking life in enemy gunfire and take down those enemies one by one. Those enemies were rather slippery and they hide here and there in the lane. We have to be careful of those shooting from somewhere we didn't notice. Act quickly once we found where they hide and fire without any hesitation.
In the gunfire of World War II,only brave ones could be heroes and could laugh last. Honor goes to those soldiers fight like a machine!Gunfire is just a firework to them. Fighting and shooting are their mission and whole meaning of life in battle!
Cross the gunfire,soldiers! Take down those enemies and be HERO!
